guidance.text: Your word is a lamp to guide my feet and a light for my path.
guidance.message: ✨ When it comes to making decisions, it’s often easy to ignore what this Bible verse tells us. This verse instructs us that when we are unsure about the right choice, we should rely on God’s word for guidance. 📖 God’s word can be the answer to your questions. It can be the light to show you which path to take. The key is to spend time in God’s word and get to know what God says. 🙏 God’s word will bring light and help you make the right decision.

setbacks.text: What He opens, no one can close; and what He closes, no one can open.
setbacks.message: 💔 God uses adversities, bad breaks, and disappointments to move us to where He wants us to be. The trouble looks like a setback, but it's really transportation 🚪➡️. We think God only uses favor, good breaks, and open doors to get us to our destiny, but He uses closed doors just as much as open doors. We can’t see it at the time, we don’t like it, it’s uncomfortable 😔, but it’s the hand of God ordering our steps. Walk boldly 🚶‍♂️ through the doors God has for you today.

love.message: ❤️ If you struggle with loving others, don’t feel bad; we all do from time to time. Start praying 🙏 about all of your relationships. Take them one by one, and ask God what you can do to make them better. Perhaps He can give you an idea 💡 for an area you can improve or show you a simple way to begin loving others more. Determine to let today’s verse not just be an empty suggestion, but rather the way you choose to live your life each day. 🌟

future.text: My future is in your hands.
future.message: 🌅 Your future has already been set in God’s hands. He’s already worked out what you’re worried about, so why don’t you come back to a place of peace 🕊️, a place of faith ✝️? What He started, He’s going to finish. Long before you were born, He’s been lining up what you need, arranging things to fall into place so you can fulfill your purpose. 🌟 Trust Him, He’s got you.

healing.text: I will give you back your health and heal your wounds,’ says the Lord.
healing.message: 💖 If you are hurting, sick, tired, or empty, it is time to pray for healing 🌿. Sometimes you forget physical pain from years back, but you never forget emotional wounds 💔. God wants to step into your life, heal your broken hearts 💕, and bind up every wound. If you or a loved one is battling a serious illness—there is hope! 🌈 God is a healing God, and nothing is impossible with Him! ✝️ One touch from God can change everything. When you speak words of faith over your situation and come into agreement with what God’s Word says about you, power and healing are released. 🙌

attitude.text: You must have the same attitude that Christ Jesus had.
attitude.message: 🌻 We are to represent Christ alive in us as we live and go through life in the world. He wants to radiate out of us in our words, attitudes, and actions. 🌟 Don’t be discouraged with yourself because you haven’t arrived yet. 🚶 Living a Christ-Reflecting Life is Possible. The more God works in your life, the closer you grow to Him 💖, and the better you’re able to reflect Him.

loneliness.text: Don’t put your trust in mere humans.
loneliness.message: 😢 Though we put trust in many people, our confident expectation is not always met. Though we don’t always trust God, He always gives us a reason to trust 🙏. God is a trustworthy refuge 🕊️, a permanent one, a person to run to and a place to reside. Humans cannot offer that for us, and that is why we need to keep our focus on God ✝️. He is for us what people never can be, and for that, He will always remain trustworthy. 💕

identity.text: I knew you before I formed you in your mother’s womb.
identity.message: 🌟 Before you showed up on Planet Earth 🌍, God already decided who you would be and laid out a purpose for your life. You came through your mother, but you came from Almighty God. ✝️ Your mother gave birth to you, but He gave you life. God doesn't create anyone average. 💎 He calls you 'a masterpiece' and His most prized creation. 🏆 There is potential inside that you've not tapped into yet. God has destined you to do something awesome 💪. Make this a new day in your life. See yourself the way God sees you 👑 and step up to who you really are.
